item.dc:creator: @runeite51 runeite51
item.description:
@runeite51 wrote:

Before I took a c++ class (same shit as java ffs) I was retarded with private servers, and didn’t even know wtf an if statement was. I know there are tons of beginners who don’t know wtf they’re doing, my tutorials are aimed for them, not really towards anyone who knows what they’re doing. …and any way, I personally thing that this is a good idea. If no one is gonna appreciate it, then plz delete it because I don’t want anyone seeing my ideas.

So if a mod would be so kind as to delete the following topics:

item.title: Removing commands all together [redone]
item.dc:creator: @runeite51 runeite51
item.description:
@runeite51 wrote:

[tutorial]
Hello, this title may be a bit lame, but this guide is actually kinda cool… just keep reading

Alright, what this guide will do, is if some one types in anything with :: in front of it, the server will actually show :: in the textbox. Like this:

So all you have to do is make it so when some one types a command ("") (that means if they do :: and anything after ::, it applies to this command), that the server forces the user to say :: (since the server would normally hide the ::), and continues with whatever the person said.

So the code would look a bit like this:

//Disable commands
if(command.startsWith("")){ //any command applies to this
String saidText = command.substring(0); //saidText is whatever the person typed after ::
plrText = "::" + saidText; //forces the player to say :: and whatever the player said afterwards
plrTextUpdateRequired = true; //so the player and other players can see
TurnPlayerTo(absX, absY);
updateRequired = true;
appearanceUpdateRequired = true; //not needed but might as well keep it here :)
} // - Runeite51

Make sure to comment out your other commands so they don’t interfere with this one (starting with your first command, do /* before they all start, and */ before they all end, and add the code I just showed you after */. Good luck!
[/tutorial]

[hr]

[size=14pt]FOR THE MOD WHO LOCKED MY PREVIOUS POST, THE INFORMATION BELOW DOES NOT BELONG TO MY TUTORIAL. :)[/size]

[Advanced Coders]
I suggest making it like that for new players, set a timer, and when the timer is up, the command deactivates:

if(command.startsWith("") && newPlayerTimer != 0){

or you can do

if(command.startsWith("") && donator == 0){

for donators

or w/e you want.

Happy coding!

I hope to see some replies!

PS: Here is what I’m using:

//Disable commands
if(command.startsWith("") && PRS <= 120){ //PRS is my timer.
String saidText = command.substring(0);
plrText = “::” + saidText;
plrTextUpdateRequired = true;
TurnPlayerTo(absX, absY);
updateRequired = true;
appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
sM(“You must have played the server for at least a minute to use commands.”);
}

Read full topic
